meanings.definition: The act of making something personally tailored or unique.
meanings.sent1: She loved the personalizations on her new phone case.
meanings.sent2: The personalizations on the gift made it extra special.
meanings.sent3: The personalizations on the cake were so cute, they made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: His personalizations to the project transformed it into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The personalizations in her artwork reflected her creativity and style.

meanings.definition: The process of adding personal details or characteristics to something.
meanings.sent1: The personalizations on the jacket made it stand out.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the personalizations she could add to her profile.
meanings.sent3: The personalizations on the car were so unique, they turned heads.
meanings.sent4: His personalizations to the story gave it depth and emotion.
meanings.sent5: The personalizations in her room reflected her personality and interests.

meanings.definition: The customization or individualization of something.
meanings.sent1: The personalizations on the mug made it a perfect gift.
meanings.sent2: He appreciated the personalizations on his new shoes.
meanings.sent3: The personalizations on the phone case were so funny, they made him laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her personalizations to the recipe made it her own signature dish.
meanings.sent5: The personalizations in his room showcased his unique style and taste.
